00034 #ifndef MUSTER_RANDOM_H
00035 #define MUSTER_RANDOM_H

00042 #include <sys/time.h>
00043 
00044 namespace cluster {
00045 
00057   template <class OutputIterator, class Random>
00058   void random_subset(size_t numElements, size_t sample_size, OutputIterator out, Random& random) {
00059     size_t first = 0;
00060     size_t remaining = numElements;
00061     size_t m = sample_size;
00062   
00063     while (m > 0) {
00064       if ((size_t)random(remaining) < m) {
00065         *out = first;
00066         ++out;
00067         --m;
00068       }
00069       --remaining;
00070       ++first;
00071     }
00072   }
00073 
00074 
00079   inline long get_time_seed() {
00080     struct timeval time;
00081     gettimeofday(&time, 0);
00082     return time.tv_sec * time.tv_usec;
00083   }
00084 
00085 } // namespace cluster
00086 
00087 #endif // MUSTER_RANDOM_H
